title: Saint Matthew, Plate 9 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul

description: man with short curly hair and thin curly beard, looking down to PR; man holds a blade on a staff over his PL shoulder and looks at a book; landscape with tree in background; text at bottom:  \"VIII. / CREDO IN SPIRITUM SANC- / TUM.\"
